agents.localModel

Class LocalModelAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.Agent
      • agents.SystemAgent
        • agents.localModel.LocalModelAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LocalModelAverage, LocalModelFirstExp, LocalModelMillerRegression

    public abstract class LocalModelAgent
extends SystemAgent
implements java.io.Serializable
    The abstract class of all agents in charge of the generation of the output from Context Agent. For the sake of simplicity, it's not scheduled as agent like other of the system.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
